public class CategoryController
extends java.lang.Object

      • insCategory

        @RequestMapping(value="/ref/add",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String insCategory(@ModelAttribute(value="categoryAttribute")
                                          ProductCategory category,
                                          org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult,
                                          org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Adds a new category by delegating the processing to CategoryService. Displays a confirmation JSP page
        Returns:
        if the validation error "/ref/inspage" otherwise "/ref/categorypage"
